name: Why learn Handlebars?
description: A templating app that is slightly old, but people are still learning it. Why? Why would anyone do this? Keep reading to find out.

name: EJS is the best
description: EJS is another templating framework that allows you to write regular javascript in the HTML. Read more here to learn all about it.

name: Nodemon
description: Why doesn't everyone know about Nodemon? It makes your life so much easier. Read more here to learn all about it.
